name: Dog Show Simulator 3D: Train puppies & perform amazing stunts
name_original: Dog Show Simulator 3D: Train puppies & perform amazing stunts
description:
Train little dogs and perform some crazy stunts in the dog show. The most realistic and thrilling dog simulation game with tricky and tough challenges to achieve. Control the cute dog and train it to jump through rings and other obstacle to win the dog show.
Gameplay
- Jump through multiple rings on different point
- Boost up and jump high to run over the obstacles
- Climb stairs and take slides
- Do rope jumping
- Then take the skate board to show stunts
- Catch the Frisbee
Features

- Show amazing stunts in 10 challenging dog show missions
- 2 cute dogs to select for training
- To match your mood free roam and career mode are available
- Multiple camera view to boost your gaming experience
- Task includes ring jumping, sliding, skating and rope jumping
- Realistic graphics and high quality sounds
